body.name: 64OZ Insulated Water-Bottles with Strap, Straw/Fruit Infuser Lid, Half Gallon Vacuum Insulated Water Flask Jug, Leak-proof Large Sports Jug for Outdoor Travel Camping Hiking Biking
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 26 mins
features: 【2 Lid Options (Fruit Infuser & Straw)】 Two different lids are fully leak-proof and designed for effortless drinking. The lid with fruit infuser allowing you to create refreshing and delicious infused drinks wherever you go.The straw lid ensures spill-proof sipping, and the package includes an extra straw and a straw brush for hassle-free cleaning.

【Delightful Combo Supreme】 Buy a 64 oz insulated water bottle, get 9 accessories (1 x fruit infuser lid, 1 x straw lid, 1 x survival paracord, 1 x carrying pouch, 1 x shoulder strap, 1 x protective cup mat, 2 x straws, 1 x straw brush). CEVISUME provide a lifetime warranty and 7X24H customer service.

【Dual Insulation and Exceptional Performance】 This 1/2 gallon wide-mouth water bottle with double-wall vacuum insulation and stainless steel can keep drinks cold for 48 hours, hot for 24 hours, and preserve their freshness. Ideal for staying hydrated during hot summer days or camping trips.

【Distinctive Paracord Handle Designs】The versatile paracord handle complements the flask's color and incorporates a compass, safety ring, carabiner, flint fire starter, and whistle. Unraveling it in emergencies transforms it into a robust rope, enhancing this large water jug's utility as a survival kit for wilderness expeditions.

【Protective Boot and Storage Sleeve】Enhanced silicone boots safeguard the stainless steel water bottle from breakage upon accidental drops. Plus, a storage pouch with a removable shoulder strap enables hands-free convenience. The secure zippered pocket accommodates cards, phone, keys, and more.
body.description: 64OZ Insulated Water-Bottles with Strap, Straw/Fruit Infuser Lid, Half Gallon Vacuum Insulated Water Flask Jug, Leak-proof Large Sports Jug for Outdoor Travel Camping Hiking Biking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Hydrated and Impressed on Your Adventures!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the chance to put the KAIHOYI 64oz Insulated Water Bottle to the test, and let me tell you, I'm thoroughly impressed! Whether you're tackling a mountain hike, hitting the gym, or simply staying hydrated on the go, this bottle has everything you need.Built to Last:First things first, the quality is undeniable. The bottle feels sturdy and well-made, with a sleek design that doesn't compromise on functionality. I particularly appreciate the included strap, making it easy to carry on long treks or attach to your backpack.Keeps Your Cool (Literally):The true test of any insulated bottle is its ability to keep drinks cold. And let me tell you, the KAIHOYI does not disappoint! After 8 hours filled with ice, my water was still refreshingly cold – a lifesaver on a hot day! This double-walled insulation is a game-changer for those who prefer their beverages icy-cold, no matter the adventure.Versatility is Key:This bottle isn't just about keeping your water cold; it's about convenience and customization. The included fruit infuser lid lets you add your favorite flavors to your water, while the straw lid provides spill-proof sipping on the go. Plus, the leak-proof design ensures your bag stays dry, no matter how bumpy the ride.Love the Extras:The little things make a big difference, and KAIHOYI understands that. The additional lids and the carrying strap make this bottle incredibly versatile and user-friendly. It's clear that the designers have thought of everything to make your hydration experience as enjoyable as possible.Overall:If you're looking for a high-quality, feature-packed water bottle that can keep up with your active lifestyle, look no further than the KAIHOYI 64oz Insulated Water Bottle. It's a fantastic value for the price, and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to stay hydrated and happy on their adventures!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for outdoor sports.
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality insulated stainless steel water bottle. It holds 64oz, is truly leakproof, and comes with all of the accessories needed for a hiking or camping trip. It has two lids that screw on tight. One has two straws and the other has a fruit infuser. There is a sleeve that fits snug around the entire bottle that has a zippered pocket large enough for a cell phone. Encasing the bottom of the water bottle is a thick silicon ring that keeps it from slipping or from scratching anything. Woven into the paracord is a small compass that actually worked well for me and flint starter as well as a whistle. There is a handle attached to the lid and a carabiner attached to the neck of the stainless bottle. This insulated water bottle works well for both hot and cold liquids. This stainless steel water bottle with all of the accessories is well made, durable, and would make a great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You get a lot for your money with this water bottle. I have a similar one from another company and I had to buy the carry sleeve separately. This one includes the sleeve as well as a paracord handle that has an emergency whistle, compass and fire starter on it. It also has two different tops - wide mouth and a flip top. Two straws are included for the flip top with it as well as a brush to clean them. The sleeve has pockets on it for your essentials - phone, wallet, keys etc. The plastic ring for the paracord handle is tough to take on and off but other than that i can't find any flaws with all that you get with this bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect water jug
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size jug for an all day water drinker. My previous ones were either too small or oversized and hard to carry around. This jug is an excellent value as it comes with carry case carry strap and fruit infuser and the temp stays cold all day and into the next day. Durability is super strong and ready to take on the day from in and out of bags to gyms and around the house. Highly recommend this 5*s
